ingredients: 4 cups whole blanched almonds,1/4 cup honey,2 teaspoons cinnamon,1 orange, zest grated

ingredients: 2 1/2 pound boneless top loin pork roast,2/3 cup panko, (Japanese bread crumbs),1/3 cup fontina cheese, shredded (about 1 ounce),1 tablespoon fresh sage, chopped,salt and pepper,4 thin slices prosciutto

ingredients: 3 tea bags black tea,2 tablespoons coconut chips,2 tablespoons ginger flakes,8 cloves,5 green cardamom pods,1 cinnamon stick, roughly chopped,1/2 leftover, empty vanilla bean, finely chopped

ingredients: Sea salt and cracked black pepper,20-ounce rib-eye steak
